text:
Would be nice if org.apache.catalina.valves.AccessLogValve recognized an 
additional variable %T as defined in 
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/mod/mod_log_config.html#formats:
%T: The time taken to serve the request, in seconds.
creator: eric.jain@gmail.com

text:
It already does. See the java docs (in the downloaded distribution) for the
AccessLogValve for the most recent version.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
eric.jain@gmail.com
text: Thanks, it does in fact work, must have accidently looked into older JavaDocs.
